message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $80.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I can do $100, which is the minimum I'm willing to go. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was really hoping to get it for a bit cheaper. I'm willing to pay $90 for the product.
I'm still not willing to go below $100, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway between $90 and $100, so I'll offer you $95. It's the best I can do.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit away from $95. I'm willing to pay $92 for the product. It's my final offer, I'm not willing to go any lower.

I'm not willing to go below $100, Bob. I think $92 is still a bit too low considering the product's value. I'll meet you halfway between $92 and $100, so I'll offer you $96. It's my final offer, I'm not willing to go any lower.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit away from $96. I'm willing to pay $94 for the product. This is my last offer, I'm not willing to go any lower.

I'm not willing to go below $100, Bob. I think $94 is still a bit too low considering the product's value. I'll make one final offer, I'll meet you halfway between $94 and $100, so I'll offer you $97. This is my last offer, I'm not willing to go any lower.

I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not willing to pay $97. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product, and that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider buying from John for $100.
